scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name webapp
scripts.deploy:migrate: wrangler d1 migrations apply webapp-production --remote && npm run deploy
scripts.db:reset: rm -rf .wrangler/state/v3/d1 && npm run db:migrate:local && npm run db:seed
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:sync:ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios
scripts.cap:sync:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.cap:run:ios: npm run cap:sync:ios && npx cap run ios
scripts.cap:run:android: npm run cap:sync:android && npx cap run android
